mutants.code:
import re

def is_valid_url(url):
    regex = re.compile('^(http://|https://)?(?:(?:[A-Z0-9](?:[A-Z0-9-]{0,61}[A-Z0-9])?\\.)+[A-Z]{2,6}\\.?|(?:\\d{1,3}\\.){3}\\d{1,3})(?::\\d+)?(?:/?|[/?]\\S+)$', re.IGNORECASE)
    return re.match(regex, url) is None

import re

def is_valid_url(url):
    regex = re.compile('', re.IGNORECASE)
    return re.match(regex, url) is not None
